<br>

[![Typing SVG](https://readme-typing-svg.herokuapp.com?font=Bungee&color=%2310BBA4&size=30&vCenter=true&width=390&height=50&lines=Hey%2C+I'm+Marco.)](https://git.io/typing-svg)

I graduated in mechatronics engineering and have a keen interest in front-end development. I enjoy creating engaging and 
intuitive user experiences. Currently, I work with React and React Native and am always looking to learn and explore 
new technologies. When I'm not coding, I like to read and listen to music.

<br>
